function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate environmental cleaning and maintenance","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Scarcity of papers studying interventions activities","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gaps in fm activities that contribute to infection control","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of proper
